data.spec:
host: "lightapi.net"
service: "host"
schemas:
  getOrgRequest:
    title: "Org List"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      offset:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record offset"
      limit:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record limit"
      active:
        type: "boolean"
        description: "Active"
    required:
    - "limit"
    - "offset"
    - "active"
  getHostRequest:
    title: "Host List"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      offset:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record offset"
      limit:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record limit"
      active:
        type: "boolean"
        description: "Active"
    required:
    - "limit"
    - "offset"
    - "active"
  getHostByDomainRequest:
    title: "Host List"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      domain:
        type: "string"
        description: "Domain"
    required:
    - "domain"
  getFreshOrgRequest:
    title: "Org"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      domain:
        type: "string"
        description: "Domain"
      aggregateVersion:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Aggregate Version"
    required:
    - "domain"
    - "aggregateVersion"
  getFreshHostRequest:
    title: "Host"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      aggregateVersion:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Aggregate Version"
    required:
    - "hostId"
    - "aggregateVersion"
  getHostByIdRequest:
    title: "Host Dashboard"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
    required:
    - "hostId"
  getHostDomainByIdRequest:
    title: "Host Domain"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
    required:
    - "hostId"
  getUserHostRequest:
    title: "User Host"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      offset:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record offset"
      limit:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record limit"
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      active:
        type: "boolean"
        description: "Active"
    required:
    - "limit"
    - "offset"
    - "active"
    - "hostId"
action:
- name: "getOrg"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetOrg"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getOrgRequest"
    example:
      offset: 0
      limit: 10
      active: true
- name: "getHost"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetHost"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getHostRequest"
    example:
      offset: 0
      limit: 10
      active: true
- name: "getHostByDomain"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetHostByDomain"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getHostByDomainRequest"
    example:
      domain: "example.com"
- name: "getFreshOrg"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetFreshOrg"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getFreshOrgRequest"
    example:
      domain: "example.com"
      aggregateVersion: 1
- name: "getFreshHost"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetFreshHost"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getFreshHostRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      aggregateVersion: 1
- name: "getHostLabel"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetHostLabel"
  skipAuth: true
  request:
    schema: null
- name: "getHostById"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetHostById"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getHostByIdRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
- name: "getHostDomainById"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetHostDomainById"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getHostDomainByIdRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
- name: "getUserHost"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetUserHost"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getUserHostRequest"
    example:
      offset: 0
      limit: 10
      active: true
      hostId: "host123"

host: "lightapi.net"
service: "host"
schemas:
  createOrgRequest:
    title: "Create Org"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      domain:
        type: "string"
        description: "Domain Name"
      orgName:
        type: "string"
        description: "Org Name"
      orgDesc:
        type: "string"
        description: "Org Desc"
      orgOwner:
        type: "string"
        description: "Org Owner"
    required:
    - "domain"
    - "orgName"
    - "orgOwner"
  updateOrgRequest:
    title: "Update Org"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      domain:
        type: "string"
        description: "Domain Name"
      orgName:
        type: "string"
        description: "Org Name"
      orgDesc:
        type: "string"
        description: "Org Desc"
      orgOwner:
        type: "string"
        description: "Org Owner"
    required:
    - "domain"
    - "orgName"
    - "orgOwner"
  deleteOrgRequest:
    title: "Delete Org"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      domain:
        type: "string"
        description: "Domain Name"
    required:
    - "domain"
  createHostRequest:
    title: "Create Host"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      domain:
        type: "string"
        description: "Domain"
      subDomain:
        type: "string"
        description: "Sub Domain"
      hostDesc:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Desc"
      hostOwner:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Owner"
    required:
    - "domain"
    - "subDomain"
    - "hostOwner"
  updateHostRequest:
    title: "Update Host"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      domain:
        type: "string"
        description: "Domain"
      subDomain:
        type: "string"
        description: "Sub Domain"
      hostDesc:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Desc"
      hostOwner:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Owner"
    required:
    - "hostId"
    - "domain"
    - "subDomain"
    - "hostOwner"
  deleteHostRequest:
    title: "Delete Host"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
    required:
    - "hostId"
  switchUserHostRequest:
    title: "Switch User Host"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
    required:
    - "hostId"
  createUserHostRequest:
    title: "Create User Host"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      userId:
        type: "string"
        description: "User Id"
    required:
    - "hostId"
    - "userId"
  deleteUserHostRequest:
    title: "Delete User Host"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      userId:
        type: "string"
        description: "User Id"
      aggregateVersion:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Aggregate Version"
    required:
    - "hostId"
    - "userId"
    - "aggregateVersion"
action:
- name: "createOrg"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "CreateOrg"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/createOrgRequest"
    example:
      domain: "example.com"
      orgName: "org name"
      orgDesc: "org description"
      orgOwner: "user123"
- name: "updateOrg"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "UpdateOrg"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/updateOrgRequest"
    example:
      domain: "example.com"
      orgName: "org name"
      orgDesc: "org description"
      orgOwner: "user123"
- name: "deleteOrg"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "DeleteOrg"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/deleteOrgRequest"
    example:
      domain: "example.com"
- name: "createHost"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "CreateHost"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/createHostRequest"
    example:
      domain: "example.com"
      subDomain: "dev"
- name: "updateHost"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "UpdateHost"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/updateHostRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      domain: "example.com"
      subDomain: "dev"
- name: "deleteHost"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "DeleteHost"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/deleteHostRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
- name: "switchUserHost"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "SwitchUserHost"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/switchUserHostRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
- name: "createUserHost"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "CreateUserHost"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/createUserHostRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      userId: "user123"
- name: "deleteUserHost"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "DeleteUserHost"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/deleteUserHostRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      userId: "user123"
      aggregateVersion: 1

host: "lightapi.net"
service: "user"
schemas:
  queryUserByEmailRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      email:
        type: "string"
        description: "user email address"
    required:
    - "email"
  queryUserByIdRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      userId:
        type: "string"
        description: "A unique user id"
    required:
    - "userId"
  queryUserByTypeEntityIdRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      userType:
        type: "string"
        description: "User Type"
      entityId:
        type: "string"
        description: "A unique user id for the type"
    required:
    - "userType"
    - "entityId"
  getNonceByUserIdRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      userId:
        type: "string"
        description: "User Id"
    required:
    - "userId"
  getUserLabelRequest:
    title: "User Label"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
    required:
    - "hostId"
  getUserLabelNotInHostRequest:
    title: "User Label Not In Host"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
    required:
    - "hostId"
  queryUserByWalletRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      taijiWallet:
        type: "string"
        description: "user taiji wallet address"
    required:
    - "taijiWallet"
  loginUserRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      email:
        type: "string"
      password:
        type: "string"
    required:
    - "email"
    - "password"
  getPrivateMessageRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      email:
        type: "string"
    required:
    - "email"
  getNotificationRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
      userId:
        type: "string"
    required:
    - "hostId"
    - "userId"
  listUserByHostIdRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      offset:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record Offset"
      limit:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record Limit"
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "user hostId"
      filters:
        type: "string"
        description: "Filters"
      globalFilter:
        type: "string"
        description: "Global Filter"
      sorting:
        type: "string"
        description: "Sorting"
      active:
        type: "boolean"
        description: "Active"
    required:
    - "hostId"
    - "offset"
    - "limit"
    - "active"
  getPaymentRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      email:
        type: "string"
        description: "Merchant user email address"
    required:
    - "email"
  getPaymentByIdRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      userId:
        type: "string"
        description: "A unique user id"
    required:
    - "userId"
  getClientTokenRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      userId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Merchant userId"
      merchantId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Merchant Id"
    required:
    - "userId"
    - "merchantId"
  getCustomerOrderRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      email:
        type: "string"
        description: "Customer Email"
      offset:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record Offset"
      limit:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record Limit"
      active:
        type: "boolean"
        description: "Active"
    required:
    - "email"
    - "offset"
    - "limit"
    - "active"
  getMerchantOrderRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      email:
        type: "string"
        description: "Merchant Email"
      status:
        type: "string"
        description: "Order Status"
      offset:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record Offset"
      limit:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Record Limit"
      active:
        type: "boolean"
        description: "Active"
    required:
    - "email"
    - "status"
    - "offset"
    - "limit"
    - "active"
  getReferenceRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      name:
        type: "string"
        description: "Table name"
      lang:
        type: "string"
        description: "Label language"
      rela:
        type: "string"
        description: "Relationship name"
      from:
        type: "string"
        description: "From value in rela"
    required:
    - "name"
  getRolesByEmailRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      email:
        type: "string"
        description: "Merchant Email"
    required:
    - "email"
  getHostsByUserIdRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      userId:
        type: "string"
        description: "User Id"
    required:
    - "userId"
  getHostLabelByUserIdRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      userId:
        type: "string"
        description: "User Id"
    required:
    - "userId"
  getUserByIdRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      userId:
        type: "string"
        description: "A unique user id"
      aggregateVersion:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Aggregate Version"
    required:
    - "userId"
    - "aggregateVersion"
action:
- name: "queryUserByEmail"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "QueryUserByEmail"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/queryUserByEmailRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
- name: "queryUserById"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "QueryUserById"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/queryUserByIdRequest"
    example:
      userId: "user123"
- name: "queryUserByTypeEntityId"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "QueryUserByTypeEntityId"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/queryUserByTypeEntityIdRequest"

      userType: "C"
      entityId: "cust123"
- name: "getNonceByUserId"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetNonceByUserId"
  skipAuth: true

      $ref: "#/schemas/getNonceByUserIdRequest"

- name: "getUserLabel"

- name: "queryUserByWallet"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "QueryUserByWallet"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/queryUserByWalletRequest"
    example:
      taijiWallet: "0x1234567890abcdef"
- name: "loginUser"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "LoginUser"
  skipAuth: true
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/loginUserRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
      password: "password123"
- name: "getPrivateMessage"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetPrivateMessage"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getPrivateMessageRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
- name: "getNotification"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetNotification"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getNotificationRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
- name: "listUserByHostId"
  version: "0.1.0"

  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/listUserByHostIdRequest"

      hostId: "host123"
      offset: 0

      active: true
- name: "getPayment"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetPayment"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getPaymentRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
- name: "getPaymentById"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetPaymentById"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getPaymentByIdRequest"

      userId: "user123"
- name: "getClientToken"
  version: "0.1.0"

  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getClientTokenRequest"

      userId: "user123"
      merchantId: "merchant123"
- name: "getCustomerOrder"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetCustomerOrder"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getCustomerOrderRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
      offset: 0
      limit: 10
      active: true
- name: "getMerchantOrder"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetMerchantOrder"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getMerchantOrderRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
      status: "pending"
      offset: 0
      limit: 10
      active: true
- name: "getReference"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetReference"
  skipAuth: true
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getReferenceRequest"
    example:
      name: "countries"
      lang: "en"
      rela: "region"

- name: "getRolesByEmail"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetRolesByEmail"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getRolesByEmailRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
- name: "getHostsByUserId"
  version: "0.1.0"

    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getHostsByUserIdRequest"
    example:
      userId: "01964b05-5532-7c79-8cde-191dcbd421b8"
- name: "getHostLabelByUserId"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetHostLabelByUserId"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getHostLabelByUserIdRequest"

- name: "getUserById"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "GetUserById"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/getUserByIdRequest"

      aggregateVersion: 1

host: "lightapi.net"
service: "user"
schemas:
  createUserRequest:
    title: "Service"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "user host indicator the organization for user"
      email:
        type: "string"
        description: "user email address"
      entityId:
        type: "string"
        description: "a unique entity id for user type"
      userType:
        title: "User Type"
        type: "string"
      referralId:
        type: "string"
        title: "Referral Id or Email"
      managerId:
        type: "string"
        title: "Manager Id or Email"
      language:
        type: "string"
        description: "preferred language of user"
        enum:
        - "en"
      password:
        type: "string"
        description: "raw password of user"
      passwordConfirm:
        type: "string"

        description: "End timestamp"

    - "startTs"
  importPortalEventRequest:
    title: "Import"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      portalServices:
        type: "string"
        description: "Portal services"
      aggregateTypes:
        type: "string"
        description: "Aggregate Types"
      eventTypes:
        type: "string"
        description: "Event Types"
      startTs:
        type: "string"
        description: "Start timestamp"
      endTs:
        type: "string"
        description: "End timestamp"
      replacements:
        type: array
        title: Replacements
        maxItems: 20
        items:
          type: object
          properties:
            fieldName:
              title: Field Name
              type: string
            fromValue:
              title: From Value
              type: string
            toValue:
              title: To Value
              type: string
          required:
            - fieldName
            - fromValue
            - toValue
      enrichments:
        type: array
        title: Enrichments
        maxItems: 20
        items:
          type: object
          properties:
            fieldName:
              title: Field Name
              type: string
            action:
              title: Action
              type: string
            sourceField:
              title: Source Field
              type: string
          required:
            - fieldName
            - action
      eventText:
        title: "Event Text"
        description: "Event text to be imported"
        type: "string"
        minLength: 1
      eventUrl:
        title: "Event URL"
        description: "Event URL to be imported"
        type: "string"
        minLength: 1
    required:
    - "hostId"
    oneOf:
    - required:
      - "eventText"
    - required:
      - "eventUrl"
action:
- name: "createUser"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "CreateUser"
  skipAuth: true
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/createUserRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      email: "test@example.com"
      entityId: "cust123"
      userType: "C"
      language: "en"
      password: "password"
      passwordConfirm: "password"
      firstName: "John"
      lastName: "Doe"
      phoneNumber: "123-456-7890"
      gender: "M"
      birthday: "1980-01-01"
      country: "US"
      province: "CA"
      city: "Los Angeles"
      postCode: "12345"
      address: "123 Main St"
- name: "onboardUser"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "OnboardUser"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/onboardUserRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      email: "test@example.com"
      entityId: "cust123"
      userType: "C"
      language: "en"
      firstName: "John"
      lastName: "Doe"
      phoneNumber: "123-456-7890"
      gender: "M"
      birthday: "1980-01-01"
      country: "US"
      province: "CA"
      city: "Los Angeles"
      postCode: "12345"
      address: "123 Main St"
- name: "createSocialUser"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "CreateSocialUser"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/createSocialUserRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      email: "test@example.com"
      userId: "socialuser123"
      userType: "C"
      language: "en"
      firstName: "Jane"
      lastName: "Doe"
- name: "deleteUserById"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "DeleteUserById"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/deleteUserByIdRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      userId: "user123"
- name: "updateUserById"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "UpdateUserById"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/updateUserByIdRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      email: "test@example.com"
      userId: "user123"
      entityId: "cust123"
      userType: "E"
      language: "en"
      firstName: "Updated First"
      lastName: "Updated Last"
      phoneNumber: "555-1234"
      gender: "F"
      birthday: "1990-02-02"
      country: "CA"
      province: "ON"
      city: "Toronto"
      postCode: "54321"
      address: "345 Fake St"
- name: "changePassword"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "ChangePassword"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/changePasswordRequest"
    example:
      oldPassword: "oldpassword"
      newPassword: "newpassword"
      passwordConfirm: "newpassword"
- name: "forgetPassword"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "ForgetPassword"
  skipAuth: true
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/forgetPasswordRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
- name: "resetPassword"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "ResetPassword"
  skipAuth: true
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/resetPasswordRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
      token: "reset_token"
      newPassword: "newpassword"
      passwordConfirm: "newpassword"
- name: "confirmUser"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "ConfirmUser"
  skipAuth: true
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/confirmUserRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
      token: "confirm_token"
- name: "verifyUser"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "VerifyUser"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/verifyUserRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      userId: "user123"
- name: "lockUser"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "LockUser"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/lockUserRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
      reason: "suspicious activity"
- name: "unlockUser"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "UnlockUser"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/unlockUserRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
      reason: "resolved"
- name: "sendMessage"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "SendMessage"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/sendMessageRequest"
    example:
      userId: "user123"
      subject: "Welcome Message"
      content: "Hi there, welcome to our platform"
- name: "updatePayment"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "UpdatePayment"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/updatePaymentRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
      payments:
      - card_number: "1234-5678-9012-3456"
        expiry_month: "12"
        expiry_year: "2025"
        cvv: "123"
- name: "deletePayment"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "DeletePayment"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/deletePaymentRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
- name: "paymentNonce"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "PaymentNonce"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/paymentNonceRequest"
    example:
      userId: "user123"
      nonce: "payment_method_nonce"
- name: "createOrder"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "CreateOrder"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/createOrderRequest"
    example:
      userId: "user123"
      order:
        items:
        - id: "item123"
          qty: 2
        total: 100
- name: "cancelOrder"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "CancelOrder"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/cancelOrderRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
      merchantUserId: "merchant123"
      orderId: "order123"
- name: "deliverOrder"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "DeliverOrder"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/deliverOrderRequest"
    example:
      email: "test@example.com"
      customerUserId: "cust123"
      orderId: "order123"
- name: "exportPortalEvent"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "ExportPortalEvent"
  scope: "portal.r"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/exportPortalEventRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      portalServices: "service1,service2"
- name: "importPortalEvent"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "ImportPortalEvent"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/importPortalEventRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      portalServices: "service1,service2"

    required:

host: "lightapi.net"
service: "config"
schemas:
  createConfigRequest:
    title: "Create Config"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      configName:
        type: "string"
        description: "Config Name, which is the name of the config file"
      configPhase:
        type: "string"
        description: "Config Phase"
      configType:
        type: "string"
        description: "Config Type"
      light4jVersion:
        type: "string"
        description: "light-4j Version"
      classPath:
        type: "string"
        description: "Java class path or package"
      configDesc:
        type: "string"
        description: "Config Desc"
    required:
    - "configName"
    - "configPhase"
    - "configType"
  updateConfigRequest:
    title: "Update a configuration module or handler"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      configId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Config Id, which is a UUID"
      configName:
        type: "string"
        description: "Config Name, which is the name of the config file"
      configPhase:
        type: "string"
        description: "Config Phase"
      configType:
        type: "string"
        description: "Config Type"
      light4jVersion:
        type: "string"
        description: "light-4j Version"
      classPath:
        type: "string"
        description: "Java class path or package"
      configDesc:
        type: "string"
        description: "Config Desc"
    required:
    - "configId"
    - "configName"
    - "configPhase"
    - "configType"
  deleteConfigRequest:
    title: "Delete a config"
    type: "object"
    properties:

        description: "Config Id"
    required:
    - "configId"

host: "lightapi.net"
service: "deployment"
schemas:
  getPipelineRequest:
    title: "Pipeline"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      offset:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Offset"
      limit:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Limit"
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      filters:
        type: "string"
        description: "Filters"
      globalFilter:
        type: "string"
        description: "Global Filter"
      sorting:
        type: "string"
        description: "Sorting"
      active:
        type: "boolean"
        description: "Active"
    required:
    - "offset"
    - "limit"
    - "active"
    - "hostId"
  getFreshPipelineRequest:
    title: "Pipeline"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      pipelineId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Pipeline Id"
      aggregateVersion:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Aggregate Version"
    required:
    - "hostId"
    - "pipelineId"
    - "aggregateVersion"
  getPipelineLabelRequest:
    title: "Pipeline Label"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
    required:
    - "hostId"
  getPlatformRequest:

        type: "integer"
        description: "Offset"
      limit:

    - "active"
    - "hostId"

host: "lightapi.net"
service: "rule"
action:
- name: "createRule"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "CreateRule"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/createRuleRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      ruleId: "rule456"
      ruleName: "My New Rule"
      ruleVersion: "1.0"
      ruleType: "Authorization"
      ruleGroup: "Security"
      ruleDesc: "This is a rule description for my new rule"
      ruleOwner: "admin"
      common: "Y"
      conditions:
      - field: "user_type"
        operator: "equals"
        value: "employee"
      - field: "department"
        operator: "contains"
        value: "IT"
  response:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/createRuleResponse"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      ruleId: "rule456"
      ruleName: "My New Rule"
      ruleVersion: "1.0"
      ruleType: "Authorization"
      ruleGroup: "Security"
      ruleDesc: "This is a rule description for my new rule"
      ruleOwner: "admin"
      common: "Y"
      conditions:
      - field: "user_type"
        operator: "equals"
        value: "employee"
      - field: "department"
        operator: "contains"
        value: "IT"
- name: "updateRule"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "UpdateRule"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/updateRuleRequest"
    example:
      ruleId: "rule456"
      ruleName: "Updated Rule Name"
      ruleVersion: "1.1"
      ruleType: "Validation"
      ruleGroup: "Compliance"
      ruleDesc: "Updated rule description"
      ruleOwner: "manager"
      common: "N"
      conditions:
      - field: "status"
        operator: "not_equals"
        value: "pending"
  response:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/updateRuleResponse"
    example:
      ruleId: "rule456"
      ruleName: "Updated Rule Name"
      ruleVersion: "1.1"
      ruleType: "Validation"
      ruleGroup: "Compliance"
      ruleDesc: "Updated rule description"
      ruleOwner: "manager"
      common: "N"
      conditions:
      - field: "status"
        operator: "not_equals"
        value: "pending"
- name: "deleteRule"
  version: "0.1.0"
  handler: "DeleteRule"
  scope: "portal.w"
  request:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/deleteRuleRequest"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      ruleId: "rule456"
  response:
    schema:
      $ref: "#/schemas/deleteRuleResponse"
    example:
      hostId: "host123"
      ruleId: "rule456"
schemas:
  createRuleRequest:
    title: "Create Rule"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      ruleId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Rule id"
      ruleName:
        type: "string"
        description: "Rule Name"
      ruleVersion:
        type: "string"
        description: "Rule Version"
      ruleType:
        type: "string"
        description: "Rule Type"
      ruleGroup:
        type: "string"
        description: "Rule Group"
      ruleDesc:
        type: "string"
        description: "Rule desc"
      ruleOwner:
        type: "string"
        description: "Rule Owner"
      common:
        type: "string"
        enum:
        - "Y"
        - "N"
        description: "Common"
      conditions:
        type: "array"
        items:
          type: "object"
        description: "Rule Conditions"
    required:
    - "hostId"
    - "ruleId"
    - "ruleName"
    - "ruleVersion"
    - "ruleType"
    - "ruleOwner"
    - "common"
    - "conditions"
  createRuleResponse:
    title: "Create Rule"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      ruleId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Rule id"

host: "lightapi.net"
service: "tag"
schemas:
  getTagRequest:
    title: "Tag"
    description: "Get all type of tags for a host including global tags."
    type: "object"
    properties:
      offset:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Offset"
      limit:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Limit"
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      filters:
        type: "string"
        description: "Filters"
      globalFilter:
        type: "string"
        description: "Global Filter"
      sorting:
        type: "string"
        description: "Sorting"
      active:
        type: "boolean"
        description: "Active"
    required:
    - "offset"
    - "limit"
    - "active"
    - "hostId"
  getTagLabel:
    title: "Tag"
    description: "Get a list of tags by label for a host including global tags."
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
    required:
    - "hostId"
  getTagByIdRequest:
    title: "Tag"
    description: "Get a tag by id for a host."
    type: "object"
    properties:
      tagId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Tag Id"
    required:
    - "tagId"
  getTagByNameRequest:
    title: "Tag"
    description: "Get a list of tags by same name for a host including global tags."
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      tagName:
        type: "string"
        description: "Tag Name"
    required:
    - "hostId"
    - "tagName"
  getTagByTypeRequest:
    title: "Tag"
    description: "Get a list of tags by type for a host including global tags."
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      entityType:
        type: "string"
        description: "Entity Type"
    required:
    - "hostId"
    - "entityType"
  getFreshTagRequest:
    title: "Tag"
    type: "object"
    properties:
      hostId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Host Id"
      tagId:
        type: "string"
        description: "Tag Id"
      aggregateVersion:
        type: "integer"
        description: "Aggregate Version"
    required:
    - "hostId"
    - "tagId"
    - "aggregateVersion"
